column4: Speak with Dhendr at his shop north of the bindstone on the hill and browse his wares for a new weapon. Return to General Acheren afterwards.
column7: Dhendr says, « Please, take anything you need. We must ensuire you are well equiped for the battles ahead. »

column4:
You seem to have a prematured ability for dispatching the foes of Midgard. Hafheim is in your debt for helping to protect her shores.

That debt will no go unpaid. Visit Dhendr the weapon merchant at his shop north of the bindstone on the hill, he has an excellent selection of weapons which he is donating for our cause.

Speak with him and browse his wares. Once you have selected a new weapon, return to me. There are important matters at hand.
